title: Apricot and rum brioche pudding
ingredients: ['8 medium-sized slices brioche loaf, about 200 g (7 oz) in total', '4 tbsp apricot conserve', '50 g (1¾ oz) sultanas', '100 g (3½ oz) ready-to-eat dried apricots, chopped', '2 eggs', '450 ml (15 fl oz) semi-skimmed milk', '1 tsp pure vanilla extract', '1 tbsp dark rum or brandy']
